# LetterOutOfTheBoxd - Elite Movie Recommendation Tool

## Project Overview
This is an elite movie recommendation tool that analyzes Letterboxd user ratings and creates sophisticated recommendation maps based on movie themes, moods, visual styles, directors, actors, and deep content analysis.

## Key Features
- Letterboxd profile scraping and data collection
- Advanced movie analysis (themes, moods, visual styles, tone, meanings)
- Interactive recommendation mapping and visualization
- Export capabilities for recommendation lists
- Correlation analysis between user preferences and movie attributes

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: React with D3.js for interactive visualizations
- Backend: Node.js with Express
- Data Processing: Python for scraping and analysis
- Database: MongoDB or PostgreSQL for movie data storage
- Visualization: D3.js, Chart.js, or similar for interactive maps

## Development Guidelines
- Focus on data accuracy and sophisticated analysis algorithms
- Prioritize interactive and intuitive visualization design
- Ensure scalable architecture for handling large datasets
- Implement robust error handling for web scraping operations
- Design for future Letterboxd API integration

## Code Style
- Use modern JavaScript (ES6+) features
- Implement modular, reusable components
- Follow clean code principles
- Add comprehensive commenting for complex algorithms
- Use TypeScript for better type safety where applicable
